title: (x) Looking for Prisoner SF {Andrew J Sipe}
content:
Hello Everyone,

I have Created a website( [www.creativecustomlighting.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417082716/http:/www.creativecustomlighting.com/ "www.creativecustomlighting.com")) in which i have used various fonts but in particular i have used PRISONERSF Font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417082716im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CONTACT_US_ANIM_4186.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417082716im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Nav_Home_OFF_3612.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417082716im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Nav_Home_ON_6577.jpg)
  
Sorry I do a lot of effects to the font in the site so the pics of the font aren't the greatest, my apologies.

I have formatted my computer several times now and i no longer have this font in my PhotoshopCS, so now i need to make some changes and additions and i can not do so with this font. I wanted to know if anyone can help me find this font PrisonerSF i'm hoping for free. I have done several searches in search engines for this font and for the free font website i had originally received it from but i can not find it at all.

All your replies are greatly appreciated,  
Thank You
author: DoozieWD

comments.content:
Must not have looked too hard.

[Prisoner SF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417082716/http:/www.artoo.cyntex.de/files/DIGI.TTF)

I guess not,

Thanks a bunch for your reply  
Greatly Appreciated  
DoozieWD
